participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Reserved yet friendly, enjoys deep conversations and values family connections.
participant_1.background: i have one older sister. my favourite artist is travis scott. i'm currently looking for a job preferably at a restaurant. my mother is a dentist. i like playing basketball.

participant_2.name: Samantha
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and nurturing, loves sharing experiences and enjoys creative cooking.
participant_2.background: i walk three miles every day. i love to spend time with my family. i love disneyland and mickey mouse. my favorite way to relax is to read a book.
